name: WebGL2RenderingContext.isQuery
description: The WebGL2RenderingContext.isQuery() method of the WebGL 2 API returns true if the passed object is a valid WebGLQuery object.

refs.name: WebGL 2.0
refs.description: The definition of 'isQuery' in the 'WebGL 2.0' specification.
